privacy_policy

All jamtartley games use the Unity game engine - Unity Privacy Policy

They do not collect any personally identifiable data but does gather basic data such as device type and play time for analytics purposes.

Word Trail contains subscriptions options including a 1 month and a 1 year auto-renewable subscription. The amount for these subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account if purchased. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of its term if not cancelled at least 24 hours before it expires. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.

If you have any questions about the privacy policy please contact sam@jamtartley.com
